card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Solar Array
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. When you next cast an artifact spell this turn, that spell gains sunburst. (If it's a creature, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Otherwise, it enters with that many charge counters on it.)

card.name: Solar Array
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. When you next cast an artifact spell this turn, that spell gains sunburst. (If it's a creature, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Otherwise, it enters with that many charge counters on it.)

card.name: Soul of Windgrace
card.text: Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control. {G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life. {1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card. {2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Soul-Guide Lantern
card.text: When this artifact enters, exile target card from a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile each opponent's graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Spire of Industry
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.

card.name: Splendid Reclamation
card.text: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Springbloom Druid
card.text: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Sprouting Goblin
card.text: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) When this creature enters, if it was kicked, search your library for a land card with a basic land type, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.

card.name: Steel Overseer
card.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Sulfurous Springs
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Surge Conductor
card.text: Whenever another nontoken artifact you control enters, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Surge Conductor
card.text: Whenever another nontoken artifact you control enters, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Swan Song
card.text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Szarel, Genesis Shepherd
card.text: Flying You may play lands from your graveyard. Whenever you sacrifice another nontoken permanent during your turn, put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to Szarel's power on up to one other target creature.

card.name: Tear Asunder
card.text: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) Exile target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, exile target nonland permanent instead.

card.name: Tekuthal, Inquiry Dominus
card.text: Flying If you would proliferate, proliferate twice instead. {1}{U/P}{U/P}, Remove three counters from among other artifacts, creatures, and planeswalkers you control: Put an indestructible counter on Tekuthal. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

card.name: Temple of Enlightenment
card.text: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.text: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
card.text: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: The Gitrog Monster
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice The Gitrog Monster unless you sacrifice a land. You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, draw a card.

card.name: The Mycosynth Gardens
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {X}, {T}: This land becomes a copy of target nontoken artifact you control with mana value X.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Thought Monitor
card.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying When this creature enters, draw two cards.

card.name: Threefold Thunderhulk
card.text: This creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever this creature enters or attacks, create a number of 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens equal to its power. {2}, Sacrifice another artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Tireless Tracker
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Titan Forge
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this artifact: Create a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Titania, Protector of Argoth
card.text: When Titania enters, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever a land you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 5/3 green Elemental creature token.
